description: I. Summary points and commentary on Quarterly (July to September 2007) and six monthly (April to September 2007) MRSA bacteraemia data derived from mandatory surveillance, January 2008. 4 p. II. Tables showing quarterly counts of MRSA bacteraemia from April 2006 to September 2007 and six monthly + annual counts counts from April 2001 to September 2007 by NHS trust. 10 p. III. Summary points and commentary on Quarterly (July to September 2007) Clostridium difficile data derived from madatory surveillance, January 2008. 5 p. IV. Tables showing quarterly counts of Clostridium difficile from April 2006 to September 2007, annual counts from 2004 to 2006 and quarterly counts for over 65s from January 2006 to September 2007, by NHS trust. 11 p.
